Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: distinguish some of its phases.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: The creation of characters is what many of us might at first be

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: tempted to regard as the supreme triumph of the imagination. If we

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: abstract, however, from our personal tastes and look at the matter

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: in its human and logical relations, we shall see, I think, that the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: construction of characters is not the ultimate task of poetic fiction.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: A character can never be exhaustive of our materials: for it exists

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: by its idiosyncrasy, by its contrast with other natures, by its

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: development of one side, and one side only, of our native capacities.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: It is, therefore, not by characterization as such that the ultimate

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: message can be rendered. The poet can put only a part of himself into

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: any of his heroes, but he must put the whole into his noblest work.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: A character is accordingly only a fragmentary unity; fragmentary in

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: respect to its origin,--since it is conceived by enlargement, so to

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: speak, of a part of our own being to the exclusion of the rest,--and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: fragmentary in respect to the object it presents, since a character

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: must live in an environment and be appreciated by contrast and by the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: sense of derivation. Not the character, but its effects and causes,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: is the truly interesting thing. Thus in master poets, like Homer and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Dante, the characters, although well drawn, are subordinate to the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: total movement and meaning of the scene There is indeed something

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: pitiful, something comic, in any comprehended soul; souls, like other

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: things, are only definable by their limitations. We feel instinctively

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: that it would be insulting to speak of any man to his face as we should

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: speak of him in his absence, even if what we say is in the way of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: praise: for absent he is a character understood, but present he is a

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: force respected.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: In the construction of ideal characters, then, the imagination is busy

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: with material,--particular actions and thoughts,--which suggest their

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: unification in persons; but the characters thus conceived can hardly

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: be adequate to the profusion of our observations, nor exhaustive, when

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: all personalities are taken together, of the interest of our lives.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Characters are initially imbedded in life, as the gods themselves are

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: originally imbedded in Nature. Poetry must, therefore, to render all

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: reality, render also the background of its figures, and the events

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: that condition their acts. We must place them in that indispensable

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: environment which the landscape furnishes to the eye and the social

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: medium to the emotions.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: The visible landscape is not a proper object for poetry. Its

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: elements, and especially the emotional stimulation which it gives,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: may be suggested or expressed in verse; but landscape is not thereby

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: represented in its proper form; it appears only as an element and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: associate of moral unities. Painting, architecture, and gardening, with

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the art of stage setting, have the visible landscape for their object,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: and to those arts we may leave it. But there is a sort of landscape

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: larger than the visible, which escapes the synthesis of the eye; it

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: is present to that topographical sense by which we always live in the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: consciousness that there is a sea, that there are mountains, that the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: sky is above us, even when we do not see it, and that the tribes of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: men, with their different degrees of blamelessness, are scattered over

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the broad-backed earth. This cosmic landscape poetry alone can render,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: and it is no small part of the art to awaken the sense of it at the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: right moment, so that the object that occupies the centre of vision

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: may be seen in its true lights, coloured by its wider associations,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: and dignified by its felt affinities to things permanent and great.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: As the Italian masters were wont not to paint their groups of saints

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: about the Virgin without enlarging the canvas, so as to render a broad

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: piece of sky, some mountains and rivers, and nearer, perhaps, some

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: decorative pile; so the poet of larger mind envelops his characters in

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the atmosphere of Nature and history, and keeps us constantly aware of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the world in which they move.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: The distinction of a poet--the dignity and humanity of his thought--can

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: be measured by nothing, perhaps, so well as by the diameter of the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: world in which he lives; if he is supreme, his vision, like Dante's,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: always stretches to the stars. And Virgil, a supreme poet sometimes

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: unjustly belittled, shows us the same thing in another form; his

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: landscape is the Roman universe, his theme the sacred springs of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Roman greatness in piety, consistancy, and law. He has not written a

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: line in forgetfulness that he was a Roman; he loves country life and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: its labours because he sees in it the origin and bulwark of civic

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: greatness; he honours tradition because it gives perspective and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: momentum to the history that ensues; he invokes the gods, because they

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: are symbols of the physical and moral forces, by which Rome struggled

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: to dominion.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Almost every classic poet has the topographical sense; he swarms

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: with proper names and allusions to history and fable; if an epithet

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: is to be thrown in anywhere to fill up the measure of a line, he

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: chooses instinctively an appellation of place or family; his wine

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: is not red, but Samian; his gorges are not deep, but are the gorges

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of Hmus; his songs are not sweet, but Pierian. We may deride their

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: practice as conventional, but they could far more justly deride ours

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: as insignificant. Conventions do not arise without some reason, and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: genius will know how to rise above them by a fresh appreciation of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: their rightness, and will feel no temptation to overturn them in favour

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of personal whimsies. The ancients found poetry not so much in sensible

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: accidents as in essential forms and noble associations; and this fact

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: marks very clearly their superior education. They dominated the world

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: as we no longer dominate it, and lived, as we are too distracted to

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: live, in the presence of the rational and the important.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: A physical and historical background, however, is of little moment

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: to the poet in comparison with that other environment of his

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: characters,--the dramatic situations in which they are involved. The

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: substance of poetry is, after all, emotion; and if the intellectual

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: emotion of comprehension and the mimetic one of impersonation are

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: massive, they are not so intense as the appetites and other transitive

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: emotions of life; the passions are the chief basis of all interests,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: even the most ideal, and the passions are seldom brought into play

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: except by the contact of man with man. The various forms of love and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: hate are only possible in society, and to imagine occasions in which

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: these feelings may manifest all their inward vitality is the poet's

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: function,--one in which he follows the fancy of every child, who puffs

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: himself out in his day-dreams into an endless variety of heroes and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: lovers. The thrilling adventures which he craves demand an appropriate

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: theatre; the glorious emotions with which he bubbles over must at all

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: hazards find or feign their correlative objects.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: But the passions are naturally blind, and the poverty of the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: imagination, when left alone, is absolute. The passions may ferment as

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: they will, they never can breed an idea out of their own energy. This

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: idea must be furnished by the senses, by outward experience, else the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: hunger of the soul will gnaw its own emptiness for ever. Where the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: seed of sensation has once fallen, however, the growth, variations,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: and exuberance of fancy may be unlimited. Only we still observe (as in

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the child, in dreams, and in the poetry of ignorant or mystical poets)

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: that the intensity of inwardly generated visions does not involve

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: any real increase in their scope or dignity. The inexperienced mind

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: remains a thin mind, no matter how much its vapours may be heated and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: blown about by natural passion. It was a capital error in Fichte and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Schopenhauer to assign essential fertility to the will in the creation

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of ideas. They mistook, as human nature will do, even when at times

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: it professes pessimism, an ideal for a reality: and because they saw

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: how much the will clings to its objects, how it selects and magnifies

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: them, they imagined that it could breed them out of itself. A man who

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: thinks clearly will see that such self-determination of a will is

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: inconceivable, since what has no external relation and no diversity

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of structure cannot of itself acquire diversity of functions. Such

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: inconceivability, of course, need not seem a great objection to a man

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of impassioned inspiration; he may even claim a certain consistency in

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: positing, on the strength of his preference, the inconceivable to be a

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: truth.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: The alleged fertility of the will is, however, disproved by

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: experience, from which metaphysics must in the end draw its analogies

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: and plausibility. The passions discover, they do not create, their

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: occasions; a fact which is patent when we observe how they seize

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: upon what objects they find, and how reversible, contingent, and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: transferable the emotions are in respect to their objects. A doll

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: will be loved instead of a child, a child instead of a lover, God

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: instead of everything. The differentiation of the passions, as far as

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: consciousness is concerned, depends on the variety of the objects of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: experience,--that is, on the differentiation of the senses and of the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: environment which stimulates them.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: When the "infinite" spirit enters the human body, it is determined

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: to certain limited forms of life by the organs which it wears; and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: its blank potentiality becomes actual in thought and deed, according

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: to the fortunes and relations of its organism. The ripeness of the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: passions may thus precede the information of the mind and lead to

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: groping in by-paths without issue; a phenomenon which appears not only

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: in the obscure individual whose abnormalities the world ignores, but

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: also in the starved, half-educated genius that pours the whole fire of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: his soul into trivial arts or grotesque superstitions. The hysterical

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: forms of music and religion are the refuge of an idealism that has

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: lost its way; the waste and failures of life flow largely in those

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: channels. The carnal temptations of youth are incidents of the same

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: maladaptation, when passions assert themselves before the conventional

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: order of society can allow them physical satisfaction, and long before

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: philosophy or religion can hope to transform them into fuel for its own

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: sacrificial flames.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Hence flows the greatest opportunity of fiction. We have, in a sense,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: an infinite will; but we have a limited experience, an experience sadly

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: inadequate to exercise that will either in its purity or its strength.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: To give form to our capacities nothing is required but the appropriate

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: occasion; this the poet, studying the world, will construct for us out

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of the materials of his observations. He will involve us in scenes

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: which lie beyond the narrow lane of our daily ploddings; he will place

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: us in the presence of important events, that we may feel our spirit

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: rise momentarily to the height of his great argument. The possibilities

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of love or glory, of intrigue and perplexity, will be opened up before

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: us; if he gives us a good plot, we can readily furnish the characters,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: because each of them will be the realization of some stunted potential

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: self of our own. It is by the plot, then, that the characters will be

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: vivified, because it is by the plot that our own character will be

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: expanded into its latent possibilities.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: The description of an alien character can serve this purpose only very

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: imperfectly; but the presentation of the circumstances in which that

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: character manifests itself will make description unnecessary, since

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: our instinct will supply all that is requisite for the impersonation.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Thus it seems that Aristotle was justified in making the plot the chief

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: element in fiction: for it is by virtue of the plot that the characters

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: live, or, rather, that we live in them, and by virtue of the plot

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: accordingly that our soul rises to that imaginative activity by which

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: we tend at once to escape from the personal life and to realize its

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: ideal. This idealization is, of course, partial and merely relative to

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the particular adventure in which we imagine ourselves engaged. But in

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: some single direction our will finds self-expression, and understands

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: itself; runs through the career which it ignorantly coveted, and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: gathers the fruits and the lesson of that enterprise.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: This is the essence of tragedy: the sense of the finished life, of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the will fulfilled and enlightened: that purging of the mind so much

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: debated upon, which relieves us of pent-up energies, transfers our

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: feelings to a greater object, and thus justifies and entertains our

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: dumb passions, detaching them at the same time for a moment from their

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: accidental occasions in our earthly life. An episode, however lurid,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: is not a tragedy in this nobler sense, because it does not work itself

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: out to the end; it pleases without satisfying, or shocks without

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: enlightening. This enlightenment, I need hardly say, is not a matter

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of theory or of moral maxims; the enlightenment by which tragedy is

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: made sublime is a glimpse into the ultimate destinies of our will.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: This discovery need not be an ethical gain--Macbeth and Othello attain

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: it as much as Brutus and Hamlet--it may serve to accentuate despair,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: or cruelty, or indifference, or merely to fill the imagination for

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: a moment without much affecting the permanent tone of the mind. But

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: without such a glimpse of the goal of a passion the passion has not

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: been adequately read, and the fiction has served to amuse us without

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: really enlarging the frontiers of our ideal experience. Memory and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: emotion have been played upon, but imagination has not brought anything

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: new to the light.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: The dramatic situation, however, gives us the environment of a single

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: passion, of life in one of its particular phases; and although a

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: passion, like Romeo's love, may seem to devour the whole soul, and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: its fortunes may seem to be identical with those of the man, yet much

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of the man, and the best part of him, goes by the board in such a

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: simplification. If Leonardo da Vinci, for example, had met in his youth

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: with Romeo's fate, his end would have been no more ideally tragic than

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: if he had died at eighteen of a fever; we should be touched rather by

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the pathos of what he had missed, than by the sublimity of what he had

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: experienced. A passion like Romeo's, compared with the ideal scope of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: human thought and emotion, is a thin dream, a pathological crisis.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Accordingly Aristophanes, remembering the original religious and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: political functions of tragedy, blushes to see upon the boards a

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: woman in love. And we should readily agree with him, but for two

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: reasons,--one, that we abstract too much, in our demands upon art, from

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: nobility of mind, and from the thought of totality and proportion;

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the other, that we have learned to look for a symbolic meaning in

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: detached episodes, and to accept the incidental emotions they cause,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: because of their violence and our absorption in them, as in some sense

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: sacramental and representative of the whole. Thus the picture of an

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: unmeaning passion, of a crime without an issue, does not appear to

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: our romantic apprehension as the sorry farce it is, but rather as a

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: true tragedy. Some have lost even the capacity to conceive of a true

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: tragedy, because they have no idea of a cosmic order, of general laws

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of life, or of an impersonal religion. They measure the profundity of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: feeling by its intensity, not by its justifying relations; and in the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: radical disintegration of their spirit, the more they are devoured the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: more they fancy themselves fed. But the majority of us retain some

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: sense of a meaning in our joys and sorrows, and even if we cannot

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: pierce to their ultimate object, we feel that what absorbs us here

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: and now has a merely borrowed or deputed power; that it is a symbol

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: and foretaste of all reality speaking to the whole soul. At the same

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: time our intelligence is too confused to give us any picture of that

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: reality, and our will too feeble to marshal our disorganized loves into

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: a religion consistent with itself and harmonious with the comprehended

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: universe. A rational ideal eludes us, and we are the more inclined to

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: plunge into mysticism.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Nevertheless, the function of poetry, like that of science, can only be

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: fulfilled by the conception of harmonies that become clearer as they

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: grow richer. As the chance note that comes to be supported by a melody

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: becomes in that melody determinate and necessary, and as the melody,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: when woven into a harmony, is explicated in that harmony and fixed

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: beyond recall; so the single emotion, the fortuitous dream, launched

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: by the poet into the world of recognizable and immortal forms, looks

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: in that world for its ideal supports and affinities. It must find them

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: or else be blown back among the ghosts. The highest ideality is the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: comprehension of the real. Poetry is not at its best when it depicts

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: a further possible experience, but when it initiates us, by feigning

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: something which as an experience is impossible, into the meaning of the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: experience which we have actually had.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: The highest example of this kind of poetry is religion; and although

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: disfigured and misunderstood by the simplicity of men who believe in

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: it without being capable of that imaginative interpretation of life

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: in which its truth consists, yet this religion is even then often

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: beneficent, because it colours life harmoniously with the ideal.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Religion may falsely represent the ideal as a reality, but we must

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: remember that the ideal, if not so represented, would be despised by

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the majority of men, who cannot understand that the value of things

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: is moral, and who therefore attribute to what is moral a natural

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: existence, thinking thus to vindicate its importance and value. But

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: value lies in meaning, not in substance; in the ideal which things

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: approach, not in the energy which they embody.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: The highest poetry, then, is not that of the versifiers, but that of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the prophets, or of such poets as interpret verbally the visions

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: which the prophets have rendered in action and sentiment rather than

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: in adequate words. That the intuitions of religion are poetical, and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: that in such intuitions poetry has its ultimate function, are truths

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of which both religion and poetry become more conscious the more they

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: advance in refinement and profundity. A crude and superficial theology

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: may confuse God with the thunder, the mountains, the heavenly bodies,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: or the whole universe; but when we pass from these easy identifications

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: to a religion that has taken root in history and in the hearts of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: men, and has come to flower, we find its objects and its dogmas

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: purely ideal, transparent expressions of moral experience and perfect

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: counterparts of human needs. The evidence of history or of the senses

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: is left far behind and never thought of; the evidence of the heart, the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: value of the idea, are alone regarded.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Take, for instance, the doctrine of transubstantiation. A metaphor here

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: is the basis of a dogma, because the dogma rises to the same subtle

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: region as the metaphor, and gathers its sap from the same soil of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: emotion. Religion has here rediscovered its affinity with poetry, and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: in insisting on the truth of its mystery it unconsciously vindicates

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the ideality of its truth. Under the accidents of bread and wine lies,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: says the dogma, the substance of Christ's body, blood, and divinity.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: What is that but to treat facts as an appearance, and their ideal

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: import as a reality? And to do this is the very essence of poetry, for

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: which everything visible is a sacrament--an outward sign of that inward

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: grace for which the soul is thirsting.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: In this same manner, where poetry rises from its elementary and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: detached expressions in rhythm, euphuism, characterization, and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: story-telling, and comes to the consciousness of its highest function,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: that of portraying the ideals of experience and destiny, then the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: poet becomes aware that he is essentially a prophet, and either

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: devotes himself, like Homer or Dante, to the loving expression of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the religion that exists, or like Lucretius or Wordsworth, to the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: heralding of one which he believes to be possible. Such poets are

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: aware of their highest mission; others, whatever the energy of their

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: genius, have not conceived their ultimate function as poets. They have

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: been willing to leave their world ugly as a whole, after stuffing it

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: with a sufficient profusion of beauties. Their contemporaries, their

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: fellow-countrymen for many generations, may not perceive this defect,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: because they are naturally even less able than the poet himself to

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: understand the necessity of so large a harmony. If he is short-sighted,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: they are blind, and his poetic world may seem to them sublime in its

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: significance, because it may suggest some partial lifting of their

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: daily burdens and some partial idealization of their incoherent

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: thoughts.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Such insensibility to the highest poetry is no more extraordinary than

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the corresponding indifference to the highest religion; nobility and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: excellence, however, are not dependent on the suffrage of half-baked

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: men, but on the original disposition of the clay and the potter; I mean

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: on the conditions of the art and the ideal capacities of human nature.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Just as a note is better than a noise because, its beats being regular,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the ear and brain can react with pleasure on that regularity, so all

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the stages of harmony are better than the confusion out of which they

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: come, because the soul that perceives that harmony welcomes it as the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: fulfilment of her natural ends. The Pythagoreans were therefore right

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: when they made number the essence of the knowable world, and Plato was

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: right when he said harmony was the first condition of the highest good.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: The good man is a poet whose syllables are deeds and make a harmony in

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Nature. The poet is a rebuilder of the imagination, to make a harmony

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: in that. And he is not a complete poet if his whole imagination is not

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: attuned and his whole experience composed into a single symphony.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: For his complete equipment, then, it is necessary, in the first place,

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: that he sing; that his voice be pure and well pitched, and that his

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: numbers flow; then, at a higher stage, his images must fit with one

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: another; he must be euphuistic, colouring his thoughts with many

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: reflected lights of memory and suggestion, so that their harmony may

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: be rich and profound; again, at a higher stage, he must be sensuous and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: free, that is, he must build up his world with the primary elements of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: experience, not with the conventions of common sense or intelligence;

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: he must draw the whole soul into his harmonies, even if in doing so

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: he disintegrates the partial systematizations of experience made

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: by abstract science in the categories of prose. But finally, this

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: disintegration must not leave the poet weltering in a chaos of sense

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: and passion; it must be merely the ploughing of the ground before a

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: new harvest, the kneading of the clay before the modelling of a more

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: perfect form. The expression of emotion should be rationalized by

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: derivation from character and by reference to the real objects that

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: arouse it--to Nature, to history, and to the universe of truth; the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: experience imagined should be conceived as a destiny, governed by

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: principles, and issuing in the discipline and enlightenment of the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: will. In this way alone can poetry become an interpretation of life and

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: not merely an irrelevant excursion into the realm of fancy, multiplying

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: oar images without purpose, and distracting us from our business

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: without spiritual gain.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: If we may then define poetry, not in the formal sense of giving the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: minimum of what may be called by that name, but in the ideal sense

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of determining the goal which it approaches and the achievement in

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: which all its principles would be fulfilled, we may say that poetry is

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: metrical and euphuistic discourse, expressing thought which is both

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: sensuous and ideal.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Such is poetry as a literary form; but if we drop the limitation to

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: verbal expression, and think of poetry as that subtle fire and inward

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: light which seems at times to shine through the world and to touch the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: images in our minds with ineffable beauty, then poetry is a momentary

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: harmony in the soul amid stagnation or conflict,--a glimpse of the

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: divine and an incitation to a religious life.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: Religion is poetry become the guide of life, poetry substituted

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: for science or supervening upon it as an approach to the highest

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: reality. Poetry is religion allowed to drift, left without points of

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: application in conduct and without an expression in worship and dogma;

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: it is religion without practical efficacy and without metaphysical

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: illusion. The ground of this abstractness of poetry, however, is

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: usually only its narrow scope; a poet who plays with an idea for half

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: an hour, or constructs a character to which he gives no profound

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: moral significance, forgets his own thought, or remembers it only as

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: a fiction of his leisure, because he has not dug his well deep enough

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: to tap the subterraneous springs of his own life. But when the poet

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: enlarges his theatre and puts into his rhapsodies the true visions

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of his people and of his soul, his poetry is the consecration of his

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: deepest convictions, and contains the whole truth of his religion. What

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: the religion of the vulgar adds to the poet's is simply the inertia

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: of their limited apprehension, which takes literally what he meant

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: ideally, and degrades into a false extension of this world on its own

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: level what in his mind was a true interpretation of it upon a moral

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: plane.

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: This higher plane is the sphere of significant imagination, of relevant

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: fiction, of idealism become the interpretation of the reality it

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: leaves behind. Poetry raised to its highest power is then identical

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: with religion grasped in its inmost truth; at their point of union

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: both reach their utmost purity and beneficence, for then poetry loses

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: its frivolity and ceases to demoralize, while religion surrenders its

Poem Title: THE ELEMENTS AND FUNCTION OF POETRY
line: illusions and ceases to deceive.
